mapper.select: select fixid, fix_name, fix_pwd, fix_info, fix_grade from fix where fixid = #{fixid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into fix (fixid, fix_name, fix_pwd, fix_info, fix_grade) values (#{fixid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fixName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into fix
fixid,
fix_name,
fix_pwd,
fix_info,
fix_grade,
#{fixid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{fixName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fixPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update fix

where fixid = #{fixid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
